EmailTemplate.subject: Sears Commercial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon {!Lead.Name},
I would like to briefly introduce myself and some of the products and solutions Sears Commercial can offer Choice Hotels. My name is {!Lead.OwnerFullName} and I am a local Account Manager for your area. I am very excited that Sears Commercial is now a nationally qualified vendor for Choice Hotels (www.Choicebuys.com). Choice Hotels chose to partner with Sears Commercial because Sears is a trusted brand that can offer your hotel a variety of products and services including PTAC’s and Commercial Fitness solutions at exclusive pricing. It is my goal to become a valued advisor for your hotel’s needs and to build a valuable relationship with you and your property.
I would like to stop by soon to view your property and to discuss any property improvements you have planned for this year.
Thank you for your time and let me know what day of the week and time works best for me to stop by.
